properties.title: Bains d'Anzère
properties.abstract: Situated in the heart of the village square, the resort offers relaxation in a grand, modern setting with a spectacular view of the Valais Alps. The Anzère Spa & Wellness Resort is open to all, with something for everyone.
properties.description:
The resort comprises two separate areas:
The Pool Area, open to children and adults, fitted with hydromassage beds for relaxation, a waterfall, a whirlpool and massage jets in water heated to 33°C.

The Wellness Area, open to adults and over 16’s, offers a deeply relaxing experience with a panoramic jacuzzi heated to 38C°, a hammam, a sanarium and sauna, refreshing theme-based showers, a fitness area and a rest area.

In the Pool and Wellness Areas, from Monday to Friday, we offer a range of activities and entertainment free of charge in order to make your visit a pleasurable experience.

The Treatment Area—connected with the Wellness Area—offers a selection of spa treatments including massages and face and body treatments which can be booked in advance by calling or by sending an email.
